name: Space Escapers - Epic Mega Jam 2021 - Running Out Of Space
name_original: Space Escapers - Epic Mega Jam 2021 - Running Out Of Space
description:
GAME :

A black hole is slowly eating your solar system, you need to escape before you get no more space to live ! 

Use your little ship to eat asteroids and grow in order to get through the warp drive gate without being crushed by the speed. 

Be careful ! Ssome asteroids will require you to be bigger than them otherwise... your spaceship will be destroyed. 

Oh and obviously, we won't recommend you to get into the black hole... 

It's time to go ! Turn on the engines and make the biggest score you can !

TEAM MEMBERS : 

AUBERT Flavie : 3D Art

Contact : flavieaubert38@gmail.com
